name: Free Online PDF Page Extractor - ATools
description: Free online PDF page extractor. Extract selected page ranges to a new PDF or export per-page PDFs as a ZIP.
seoDescription: Free online PDF page extractor to extract selected page ranges from a PDF. Export as a single new PDF or as per-page PDFs zipped together. Everything runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy.

ui.hint: Extract selected pages from a PDF locally (no uploads).
